Export.Routine: PNTDBSTC01 ;;SUE@Trak; 01/01/98 DAY BOOK STAIN CODES LIST ; ; Compiled December 2, 1999 13:41:29 for Cache for Windows ; Q ; print(ROWID,user,MSG) S %="\",%U="" F I=1:1:132 S %U=%U_"-" S DATE=$$DE^TXBB D TIME^TXBB S TIME=w S SLT="" I MSG="ALL" S MSG="" F S MSG=$O(^TTAB("SLT",MSG)) Q:MSG="" D A100 I MSG'="" D A100 D K100 Q A100 S LAB=$P(^TTAB("LA",MSG),"\") S DEPC=$P(^TTAB("LA",MSG),"\",8) S DEPN=$P(^TTAB("DEP",DEPC),"\") D H100 F I=1:1 S SLT=$O(^TTAB("SLT",MSG,SLT)) Q:SLT="" D A200 Q ; Cleanup, reset printer K100 D ADD^SSPRINT(ROWID,"PRT",$C(27)_"(s0p10H") K SLT,LAB,TTZH,TTZH1,MSG,DATE,TIME,TTD1 Q ; A200 S TTZH=^TTAB("SLT",MSG,SLT) F I=1:1:4 S @("TTZH"_I)=$P(TTZH,"\",I) D ADD^SSPRINT(ROWID,"PRT","!") D ADD^SSPRINT(ROWID,"PRT","?0 "_SLT) D ADD^SSPRINT(ROWID,"PRT","?11 "_TTZH1) D ADD^SSPRINT(ROWID,"PRT","?41 "_TTZH2) D ADD^SSPRINT(ROWID,"PRT","?51 "_TTZH3) D ADD^SSPRINT(ROWID,"PRT","?61 "_TTZH4) Q ;Print header H100 D ADD^SSPRINT(ROWID,"HDR",$C(27)_"(s0p16.67h0T") D ADD^SSPRINT(ROWID,"HDR","?0 PNTDBPC01") D ADD^SSPRINT(ROWID,"HDR","?30 "_$P(^CF("SM",1),"^",6)) D ADD^SSPRINT(ROWID,"HDR","?55 LABTRAK DAY BOOK STAIN CODES ") D ADD^SSPRINT(ROWID,"HDR","?105 "_DATE) D ADD^SSPRINT(ROWID,"HDR","?117 "_TIME) D ADD^SSPRINT(ROWID,"HDR","?130 "_"Page ") D ADD^SSPRINT(ROWID,"HDR","~PAGE") D ADD^SSPRINT(ROWID,"HDR","!") D ADD^SSPRINT(ROWID,"HDR","?55 FOR DEPARTMENT ") D ADD^SSPRINT(ROWID,"HDR",DEPN_" - ") D ADD^SSPRINT(ROWID,"HDR",LAB_" LABORATORY") D ADD^SSPRINT(ROWID,"HDR","!") D ADD^SSPRINT(ROWID,"HDR","?0 "_%U) D ADD^SSPRINT(ROWID,"HDR","!") D ADD^SSPRINT(ROWID,"HDR","?0 CODE") D ADD^SSPRINT(ROWID,"HDR","?11 DESCRIPTION") D ADD^SSPRINT(ROWID,"HDR","?41 MINUTE") D ADD^SSPRINT(ROWID,"HDR","?51 VALID") D ADD^SSPRINT(ROWID,"HDR","?61 PRINT") D ADD^SSPRINT(ROWID,"HDR","!") D ADD^SSPRINT(ROWID,"HDR","?61 LABELS") D ADD^SSPRINT(ROWID,"HDR","?0 ----") D ADD^SSPRINT(ROWID,"HDR","?11 -----------") D ADD^SSPRINT(ROWID,"HDR","?41 ------") D ADD^SSPRINT(ROWID,"HDR","?51 ------") D ADD^SSPRINT(ROWID,"HDR","?61 -----") D ADD^SSPRINT(ROWID,"HDR","!") Q
